name: RetroCube (itch)
description:
Retro Cube is a project I have made as a hobby to develop my coding skills and to try out concepts of game mechanics I am interested in. 

This Game is a simple top down shooter with "Tron like"  graphics and retro sounds to emulate game design from an older era. Game-play features include:

  • Random level generator for a new level to play on, making every game unique.
  • 4 enemy types
  • 5 different weapons
  • 4 power-ups 

Note that updating the game may not be regular, since I am a university student and entering my third year but if the game becomes popular-ish then that may change. 

Feel free to ask any questions about the game or game design in question and enjoy the Game!

P.S. Donations are only optional so pay what you want.
